Skills.DialogAdditionalDiceHint: Additional dice to roll for hits.
Skills.DialogAdditionalHitsHint: A number of hits to add on top of the roll total.

value.label: Danger Level
value.hint: The danger level of a monster determines their overall challenge as well as their action points.

value.label: Armor
value.hint: Armor value reduces incoming physical damage.

value.label: Action Points
value.hint: The number of action points this actor has remaining to spend on actions during combat.

turn.label: Turn Bonus
turn.hint: The number of additional action points this actor receives for each additional turn it may take in a combat round.

faces.label: Health Pool Faces
faces.hint: The size of each health die.

max.label: Health Pool Maximum
max.hint: The size of the total health pool.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of health dice that have been expended.

faces.label: Mana Pool Faces
faces.hint: The size of each mana die.

max.label: Mana Pool Maximum
max.hint: The size of the total mana pool.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of mana dice that have been expended.

faces.label: Stamina Pool Faces
faces.hint: The size of each stamina die.

max.label: Stamina Pool Maximum
max.hint: The size of the total stamina pool.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of stamina dice that have been expended.

value.label: Armor
value.hint: The armor value of this item, which reduces incoming physical damage.

size.label: Size
size.hint: The size of the accompanying blast zone when using this ammunition.

type.label: Shape
type.hint: The shape of the blast zone.

bonuses.label: Damage Bonuses
bonuses.hint: Bonuses of individual types to damage rolls.

group.label: Target Group
group.hint: The group of damage types that this ammunition will override the type of.

value.label: Type
value.hint: The new damage type that will be used in place of the overridden group.

max.label: Maximum Fusions
max.hint: The maximum number of fusions that can target this item at the same time.

value.label: Price
value.hint: The deemed value of the item.

value.label: Quantity
value.hint: The size of this stack of items.

value.label: Range
value.hint: The maximum range between you and your target when firing a projectile with this item.

reach.label: Reach
reach.hint: The maximum distance between you and your target when making an attack with this item.

value.label: Targets
value.hint: The number of targets this item can be used on at the same time.

types.label: Targeting Types
types.hint: The shape or type of targeting of this spell.

max.label: Max Uses
max.hint: The total number of uses of this item.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of uses of this item that have been spent.

value.label: Weight
value.hint: The amount that this item contributes to its owner's encumbrance.

value.label: Wielding
value.hint: The number of hands required to handle this item.

Category.SubtypeAmmoHint: The ammunition type determines which weapons can make use of it.
Category.SubtypeArmorHint: The type of armor this is, which decides how it is equipped.
Category.SubtypeElixirHint: The type of elixir this is.
Category.SubtypeShieldHint: The shield type determines how much it protects the wielder.
Category.SubtypeSpellHint: The spell type determines how it affects enemies and allies.
Category.SubtypeWeaponHint: The weapon type determines the ammunition it can use.
Category.PoolBoosterHint: The pool that this elixir can grant a boost of during an attack.
Category.PoolRestorativeHint: The pool that this elixir can restore when consumed.

Cost.ValueHintWeapon: The action point cost to make an attack with this weapon.
Cost.ValueHintSpell: The action point cost to cast a spell using this item.
Cost.ValueHintShield: The action point cost to make an attack with this shield.

EffectProperty.ExpirationHint: The trigger for when this effect will expire.
EffectProperty.SubtypeFusionHint: The properties available to choose from, derived from the chosen item subtype.

PoolConfig.SpecializationBalancedFacesHint: A balanced configuration. Each die has the same number of faces.
PoolConfig.SpecializationBalancedSizeHint: A balanced configuration. Each pool has the same size.
PoolConfig.SpecializationFocusedFacesHint: A highly focused configuration. One type of pool has a massive number of faces, but the rest are untouched.
PoolConfig.SpecializationFocusedSizeHint: A highly focused configuration. One type of pool has a massive number of die, but the rest are untouched.
PoolConfig.SpecializationSpecializedFacesHint: A specialized configuration. The pools have a small, medium, and large number of faces.
PoolConfig.SpecializationSpecializedSizeHint: A specialized configuration. The pools have a small, medium, and large amount of dice.
PoolConfig.Title: Configure Pools: {name}

SpellUseDialog.Title: {item}: Spellcasting
SpellUseDialog.BoostersHint: Boosting elixirs to consume which each act as consuming 1 additional point of mana.

WeaponUseDialog.Title: {name}: Attack
WeaponUseDialog.AmmunitionHint: An optional ammunition to use for this attack, which will alter the damage roll.
WeaponUseDialog.StaminaHint: Each point of stamina expended will increase the dice roll quantity by one.
WeaponUseDialog.BoosterItemHint: Consume the uses of a boosting elixir, each consumed use acting as 1 additional point of stamina.

Setting.CircularTokensHint: Are tokens treated as circular for the purpose of their hit area?
Setting.TemplateAreaThresholdHint: The percentage a token must overlap a template to be considered 'inside' it. The default is 0.4.
Setting.TokenBarLengthHint: The length of token bars, in degrees. The default is 120.

Warning.ItemRequiresAmmunition: This item requires ammunition to use!
Warning.ItemHasNoTemplateTypes: This item has no template types set!
Warning.ItemIsNotEquipped: The item must be equipped to be used!
Warning.NotEnoughPips: You do not have enough pips remaining to make an attack!
Warning.AlreadyAtMaxHealth: {name} is already at their maximum health.
Warning.FieldOverridden: This field has been disabled as it is being modified by an effect.
Warning.InvalidActiveEffectType: The chosen effect type is not valid for this parent.
Warning.NoAvailableEquipment: You have no available equipment of that type.
Warning.MissingActionPoints: You do not have enough Action Points to perform that action.

ElixirDialog.Title: Use Elixir: {name}
ElixirDialog.EffectHint: Pick one of the effects from the elixir that will be granted.
ElixirDialog.WarningUsage: The elixir has no remaining uses left!
ElixirDialog.WarningEffects: The elixir has no effects it can grant!
ElixirDialog.WarningCannotUseBooster: A booster elixir can only be used as part of an attack.

DefenseDialog.Title: Defense Roll
DefenseDialog.ItemsHint: Choose any of your equipped arsenal to defend against the attack and reduce incoming damage. Each item used will require 1 pip.

StatusConditions.BleedingHint: {actor} takes {level}d6 physical damage at the start of every round.
StatusConditions.BurningHint: {actor} takes {level}d12 fire damage at the start of every round.
